channel.title: CVE Feed for Premmerce -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Premmerce -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-31359|2024-08-02T01:52:56.326Z -- premmerce -- premmerce%20product%20filter%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Premmerce Premmerce Product Filter for WooCommerce.This issue affects Premmerce Product Filter for WooCommerce: from n/a through 3.7.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-27971|2024-06-06T15:23:21.752Z -- premmerce -- premmerce%20permalink%20manager%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Premmerce Premmerce Permalink Manager for WooCommerce allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Premmerce Permalink Manager for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.3.10.

item.title: CVE-2024-31359|2024-06-10T14:00:14.923Z -- premmerce -- premmerce%20product%20filter%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Premmerce Premmerce Product Filter for WooCommerce.This issue affects Premmerce Product Filter for WooCommerce: from n/a through 3.7.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-27971|2024-08-02T00:41:55.949Z -- premmerce -- premmerce%20permalink%20manager%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Premmerce Premmerce Permalink Manager for WooCommerce allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Premmerce Permalink Manager for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.3.10.
